name: Misson Guys Escape 3D
description:
Misson Guys Escape 3D is all about making a safe escape from the jail while rescuing the imprisoned inmates. Sneaking in the corridors for escaping is very tough as the guards and wardens are continuously patrolling in jail. High security checks based on modern technology has made it even tougher to make a safer escape.
Features:
Different Combating Tools!
Amazing 3D Jail Environment!
Realistic Sound Effects!
